scripts.install:all: npm install && (cd common && npm install) 2>/dev/null; (cd gateway && npm install) 2>/dev/null; for d in services/auth services/product services/comments services/payment services/order; do [ -d "$d" ] && (cd "$d" && npm install); done; true
scripts.dev: echo 'Start individual services: npm run dev:auth, dev:product, etc.'
scripts.test: npm run test:common 2>/dev/null; npm run test:gateway 2>/dev/null; for d in services/auth services/product services/comments services/payment services/order; do [ -d "$d" ] && (cd "$d" && npm test); done; true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:common 2>/dev/null; npm run lint:gateway 2>/dev/null; for d in services/auth services/product services/comments services/payment services/order; do [ -d "$d" ] && (cd "$d" && npm run lint); done; true
